activities:
Intuit provides offerings and services to small business and consumer customers in the European Union, and it processes service, business, financial and relationship data pertaining to those customers and offerings.  Intuit also contracts with service providers based in or with workers in the European Union. Intuit intends on processing and/or storing contracts, Purchase Orders, and related business contractual documents related to these vendor relationships in the United States, according to Safe Harbor principles.

Intuit applies Safe Harbor principles to Human Resources data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
